## Overview

These interactive lecture notes support the **Mathematical Foundations of Data Science (MFDS)** program at the University of Vienna. 

Designed for active learning, these materials allow you to review formal mathematical theory, execute and modify embedded code examples, and verify your understanding through integrated self-assessments.
